title: Reclaiming Amy
overview: To mark the ten year anniversary of her death, Amy Winehouse's closest family and friends reveal the truth about the music icon and the impact that her loss has had on them. With access to never-before-seen family archives and rare musical performances, this highly personal and powerful account of the life and death of one of Britainâ€™s best-loved musicians offers a new interpretation of her life, her loves and her legacy.
